text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar You downplayed #COVID19. You knew the danger and still downplayed it for three months as it spread across the country. And you have no regrets. You think you’ve done an excellent job. Over 50k deaths later you still applaud yourself. Villainous. https://t.co/phxyhcA8OG
